verbs.description: Mitch McConnell [V: is] mulling GOP demands to cancel the Senate ’s August Recess , ostensibly to get work done on spending and action on Trump ’s appointees , but also to force ten potentially vulnerable Democrats to stay in D.C. instead of campaigning .
